cast.name: 迪莫·亚历克谢夫 Dimo Alexiev

playdate: 2020-10-06(保加利亚索非亚国际电影节)
introduction: 入围2020年华沙电影节自由精神单元Danny is an influential city councillor and a charismatic businessman in an unnamed Eastern European town. When a reporter asks him to take part in a documentary on money laundering, Danny willingly agrees. But as soon as they arrive, he tells the film crew to forget about their script and just follow him and film everything. The documentary is now a feature called “Danny. Legend. God.” Danny’s antics and penchant for violence prove to be too much for the reporter and she quits the project. The rest of the crew continue filming Danny and become the silent witnesses of increasingly disturbing events…
